article.heading: Bringing you the best audio gear
article.text: Located at the heart of New York City, Audiophile is the premier store for high end headphones, earphones, speakers, and audio accessories. We have a large showroom and luxury demonstration rooms available for you to browse and experience a wide range of our products. Stop by our store to meet some of the fantastic people who make Audiophile the best place to buy your portable audio equipment.

products.name: ZX7 SPEAKER
products.about: Upgrade your sound system with the all new ZX9 active speaker. Itâ€™s a bookshelf speaker system that offers truly wireless connectivity -- creating new possibilities for more pleasing and practical audio setups.

products.name: ZX9 SPEAKER
products.about: Stream high quality sound wirelessly with minimal loss. The ZX7 bookshelf speaker uses high-end audiophile components that represents the top of the line powered speakers for home or studio use.
